get.description: Returns the current version of the file service

version.description: The current version of the service

parameters.description: The org orgKey, or "shared" for public data set or "do-internal-data" for internal datase
parameters.name: orgKey

parameters.description: The path to the file (can include subdirectories)
parameters.name: filePath

parameters.description: last-count is used to get the last count of objects in the bucket. This is used for pagination of the list results.
parameters.name: last-count

parameters.description: ContinuationToken indicates to that the list is being continued on this bucket with a token. ContinuationToken is obfuscated and is not a real orgKey. You can use this ContinuationToken for pagination of the list results.
parameters.name: continuation-token

parameters.description: Delimiter is used to group the results by a common prefix. For example, if you set the delimiter to "/", the results will be grouped by the first part of the path before the "/".
parameters.name: delimiter

parameters.description: if the list should be recursive, default is false and will only return the folders/file within the path
parameters.name: recursive

parameters.description: max number of orgKeys to return, cannot be more than 1000
parameters.name: max-orgKeys

schema.description: Directory listing with optional continuation token

200.description: Successfully retrieved file or directory listing

parameters.description: The org orgKey, or "shared" for public data set or "do-internal-data" for internal datase
parameters.name: orgKey

parameters.name: upload

parameters.description: The path to the file (can include subdirectories)
parameters.name: filePath

post.description:
Captures a custom analytics event and sends it to the PostHog tracking service.
This endpoint is used for tracking feature usage and behaviors within Deep Origin.
Event is grouped by `orgKey` if provided, and includes any extra properties.
Note: This endpoint accepts a flexible `properties` object that may include arbitrary event data.
